titleStmt.title: A breife discouery of the idle animaduersions of Marke Ridley Doctor in Phisicke vpon a treatise entituled, Magneticall aduertisements
titleStmt.author: Barlow, William, d. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Timothy Barlow, at the signe of Time in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A response to: Ridley, Mark. Magneticall animadversions (STC 21044).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
